problem_text:
18.73. b) Does every finitely generated solvable group of derived length l ⩾2 embed into some k-generated (l + 1)-solvable group, where k = k(l)?
A. Yu. Olshanskii
answer: b) It is proved that any finitely generated solvable group of derived length l can be embedded in a 4-generated solvable group of derived length l + 1 (V. A. Roman’kov, Proc. Amer. Math. Soc., 149 (2021), 4133–4143).
